title: This Is What It Would Sound Like If Lil' Wayne Played Guitar For Metallica [News]

organizations.name: wayne played guitar for metallica aka

text:
This Is What It Would Sound Like If Lil' Wayne Played Guitar for Metallica Aka just another day at Guitar Center. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 5 hours ago 1 
The lovable Stevie T presented an interesting little video, demonstrating what it would sound like if Lil' Wayne played guitar for a variety of iconic rock and metal acts. 
These include Metallica, Iron Maiden, Nirvana, Avenged Sevenfold, and more. 
You can check out the stuff in the player below. 14 hours ago in Music news , 22 comments 5 17 hours ago in Music news , 9 comments 29 2 days ago in Music news , 58 comments Trending stories 11 8 hours ago in Music news , 63 comments 10 10 hours ago in Music news , 22 comments 12 This dude's videos are the Lil Wayne solo of guitar videos. 2 Lil Wayne inspired me to play guitar. 2 This is really a thread... ON THE FUÃ‡KING HOME PAGE!? This is why I stopped going on this website. GOOD ONE UG.
